ygData.subject: Re: Strange deaths in Mistmoore
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Not sure what you are asking... writhe in agony is the text for harmtouch. You havent lived till you have tried pulling the castle with the fire wall
ygData.messageBody:
At 04:03 PM 11/11/1999 -0500, you wrote:
>From: Benjamin Jerrad Segal <birdman@...>
>
>On Wed, 10 Nov 1999 kim@... wrote:
>
>> "You writhe in agony."
>>
>> Anyone know if you get a message if the spell delivers the
>> killing blow?
>
>Pain and suffering try to strike you, but miss!
>You died.
>Pain and suffering try to strike you, but miss!
>You died.
>
>I've gotten that a few times (no pun intended).
>
>Athren
>

Not sure what you are asking... writhe in agony is the text for harmtouch.
You havent lived till you have tried pulling the castle with the fire wall
around it in the Plane of Fear.

You writhe in agony.
You writhe in agony.
You writhe in agony.hts after me.... looks like a snake.
Gendal : i suppose i should just take one for the team right
Group : Yes please
Gendal sighs

Gendal Concorden, lvl 50 Bard
Enoch Lyciferous, lvl 49 Necromancer
<Talisman>
Tunare
